title: Rockets: how they work
brief_description: Uses animated drawings and models to show how rockets achieve motion, and compares rocket power with other types of motive power. Scenes at a rocket launching site show the count-down procedure and the take-off of a giant multistage rocket. Demonstrates the functioning of a rocket guidance system.
